title: The Cost of College
teaser: With tuition rising and debt mounting, author Jeffrey Selingo helps parents and students do the math for college. Guest: Jeffrey […]

contentencoded:
With tuition rising and debt mounting, author Jeffrey Selingo helps parents and students do the math for college.


Guest: Jeffrey Selingo, Editor, The Chronicle of Higher Education
